SEARCH
Package be.brahms.rent_serve.configurations.cors

Class CorsConfig

java.lang.Object
be.brahms.rent_serve.configurations.cors.CorsConfig
All Implemented Interfaces:
WebMvcConfigurer
@Configuration public class CorsConfig extends Object implements WebMvcConfigurer
This class configures Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) for the application. CORS is a security feature that allows or restricts resources from being requested from another domain outside the domain from which the resource originated.

The configuration allows requests from a specific origin and defines which HTTP methods and headers are permitted.

  • Method Details

    • addCorsMappings

      public void addCorsMappings(CorsRegistry registry)
      This method adds CORS mappings to the application. It allows requests from "localhost angular" and permits all HTTP methods. It also allows all headers and exposes the "Authorization" header.
      Specified by:
      addCorsMappings in interface WebMvcConfigurer
      Parameters:
      registry - the CORS registry to which the mappings are added

    • corsConfigurationSource

      @Bean public CorsConfigurationSource corsConfigurationSource()
      This method creates a CORS configuration source. It sets allowed origins, methods, headers, and other CORS settings.
      Returns:
      a CORS configuration source with the defined settings
